name: Super Gran Track 10: Super Mario Kart Style! (Super Nintendo Entertainment System)
name_original: Super Gran Track 10: Super Mario Kart Style! (Super Nintendo Entertainment System)
description: This game is called Gran Track 10. This is a single player game. Use the arrow keys to control the car/kart. UP arrow is accelerate, DOWN arrow is stop/reverse, LEFT arrow is move car/kart to the left, and RIGHT arrow is move the car/kart to the right, within a 60 second timer. After the timer reaches zero, the game is over. I was deeply inspired to use a circuit track from the original Super Mario Kart game that was released on the Super Nintendo Entertainment System. (SNES) In addition, I also added a power-up, which is a checkered strip, in which it marks the player's Laps. When the player passes the line, additional time is added to the timer. Have fun playing this retro-styled Super Mario Kart game!
